definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: The range fan needs a lot of power to run.
sentences.chinese: 抽油烟机需要很大的功率来运转。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a method for manufacturing a less-oil-smoke composite bottom iron pan.
sentences.chinese: 一种少油烟复底铁锅的制造方法。

sentences.english: We have an extractor fan in the kitchen to get rid of the smell of cooking.
sentences.chinese: 我们的厨房里有台排气扇，用来消除油烟。

sentences.english: The invention discloses an environment protective type double air duct ventilator.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种环保型双风道吸油烟机。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a wind hole inclined surface connection structure of a cooker hood.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是涉及吸油烟机风孔斜面连接结构。

sentences.english: It is difficult to rid clothes of cooking smell.
sentences.chinese: 把厨房的油烟味从衣服上去掉是很难的。

sentences.english: The invention discloses an oil fume filtration combination screen.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种油烟过滤组合网板。

sentences.english: Fume smell filled shed filled with a tiring day laborer.
sentences.chinese: 油烟味充斥的小棚里坐满了劳累一天的打工仔。

sentences.english: It has a relatively high smoke point, so it won't burn or smoke at hot temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 它的烟点相对较高，所以高温下不易燃烧或产生油烟。

sentences.english: This cooker hood is not fixed at the proper angle.
sentences.chinese: 这个抽油烟机安装的角度不合适。

sentences.english: The utility model can be used for cooking fume exhausters and exhaust devices.
sentences.chinese: 可用于抽油烟机或排气装置上。
锅底的油烟弄脏了我的裤子。

sentences.english: No matter where feel, it is to stick lampblack, call a person afflictive .
sentences.chinese: 无论摸哪里，都是粘乎乎的油烟，叫人难受。

sentences.english: Chimney hood exhaust with more exhaustion power, which is suitable for all nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 抽油烟机具备超强动力，适用于任何国家。

sentences.english: The lampblack of the kitchen is the archenemy of mom, to this everybody detest.
sentences.chinese: 厨房的油烟是妈妈们的大敌，对此大家深恶痛绝。

sentences.english: If smoke what lampblack machine uses much high-power?
sentences.chinese: 如抽油烟机用多大功率的？

definition: smoke and baking fire (idiom); surrounded by flames and smoke
to stir-fry/to do the cooking/stir-fried dish
to have smoke billowing from a fireplace or stove (due to a blockage in the chimney)
